questions.question: What is the primary purpose of a virtual private cloud (VPC) in a machine learning (ML) environment?
options: To provide a secure and isolated network for hosting ML models and related resources
To enable the integration of ML models with other AWS services
To facilitate the deployment of ML models to end-users
To manage the scaling and provisioning of ML compute resources
correct_answers: To provide a secure and isolated network for hosting ML models and related resources
